name: Offical JS SDK
description: The JS SDK provides an intuitive interface for the Directus API from within a JavaScript-powered project (Browsers and Node.js).

name: Offical Gatsby Source Plugin
description: Source plugin for pulling data into Gatsby from a Directus API.

name: react-directus
description: A set of React components and utilities for Directus Headless CMS.

name: Flutter SDK
description: Flutter SDK to provide interface for Directus API.

name: PHP SDK
description: PHP SDK to provide easy access to the Directus API.

name: Lite SDK (TypeScript)
description: Query builder for the Directus API (Browser, Deno, Node.js). Bring your own fetch.

name: Nuxt Directus
description: First-Class Nuxt 3 Module for connecting with an Directus instance.

name: Nuxtus
description: Provides a Nuxt boilerplate and set of tools to automatically create Nuxt pages from Directus Collections.

name: cool-stack
description: Template repository integrating Directus & Remix into a full-stack monorepo.

name: Image Scout
description: Search and select images found on a variety of royalty free image sites (Pexels, Pixabay, Unsplash & Giphy!).

name: Editor.js Interface
description: Block editor (Editor.js) interface for Directus 9.

name: Draw Interface
description: Free draw interface for Directus app.

name: User-friendly file paths
description: Use the folder and file module structure to reference to assets.

name: Date Picker Interface
description: An alternative Date Picker Interface to the original Directus DateTime interface.

name: Search Sync
description: Sync data into a search engine index, supports Algolia, ElasticSearch & MeiliSearch.

name: Dictionary
description: Save key-value pairs as JSON blobs with a progress indicator for completeness.

name: WordPress-like Slug
description: Slug/Permalink interface with support for pre- and suffixes.

name: Link Meta
description: Stores hyperlink metadata into Directus.

name: Group Modal
description: Group interface fields into a modal that can be opened with a button.

name: Display Link
description: Display URLs with an "open in new tab" button.

name: SQL Panel
description: Panel component which shows result of stored SQL query as a table.

name: Websocket Subscribe
description: An extension to subscribe to Directus updates over a websocket.

name: SVG Map Picker Interface
description: Select a value from a SVG Map box.

name: Directus Mailer
description: An endpoint for sending emails with the Directus Nodemailer service.

name: Data Grid Interface
description: A data grid interface width @revolist/vue3-datagrid for Directus 9.

name: SparkLine Display
description: A sparkline display with apexcharts for Directus 9.

name: Tags M2M
description: M2M driven tags interface.

name: Sanitize HTML
description: Sanitize HTML inputs to Directus.

name: Directus LogSnag
description: Sending your events from Directus directly to your phone using LogSnag.

name: Field Actions
description: Adds copy to clipboard and open URL's action-buttons to fields (interface + display).

name: Generate Types
description: Adds a module for generating typescript types for a Directus JS-SDK connected to that Directus database. Also can generate Python or OpenAPI types.

name: Computed Interface
description: Perform computed value based on other fields.

name: Inline Form Interface
description: Edit M2O relations in an inline form contained in the parent record.

name: Tab Group Interface
description: Display groups as tab panels, as a pretty, space saving alternative to the accordion group.

name: Woodpecker Build Status
description: Adds status bar for Woodpecker pipeline build status to Directus UI.

name: Imagga Hook
description: Hook for file uploads to automatically tag images with Imagga API.

name: Tiptap Interface & Display
description: Tiptap rich text editor interface and display.

name: API Viewer
description: View and run API queries directly from a Module.

name: Flexible Editor
description: A Rich Text Editor (WYSIWYG) with JSON output, that allows to integrate M2A relations to make it extremely flexible.

name: BlurHash
description: A Directus extension that generates blurhashes for uploaded images.

name: How to Work With Many to Many Relationships (M2M) On Directus
Creating a Custom Panel in Directus With Chart.js
Official Examples
description: Integration examples with Directus.

name: Nuxt 3 Demo
description: Opinionated Nuxt 3 / Directus Starter with Tailwind CSS.

name: Agency OS
description: Fully complete, opinionated agency website template featuring Nuxt and Directus. View Demo.

name: Nextus
description: A comprehensive, versatile and modern website template based on Nextjs and Directus technologies. It helps you build various types of websites more quickly. View Demo.
